author: sky.cactus
content: There is value in GPU/CPU PoW mining as it creates an incredibly censorship resistant on-ramp, where you can take fiat, buy mundane goods and electricity, and receive ETH.  I don't think being a useful thing alone is enough to significantly complicate the protocol though.  Luckily, there do exist other chains that support CPU/GPU mining.  The missing piece to the puzzle here is the ability to transfer assets from one chain to another in a censorship resistant and trustless/permissionless way.
